algebraic_word_problem: A bus leaves at 6 AM and travels at 60 km/h. Another bus leaves the same station at 7 AM at 80 km/h. When will the second bus catch up?
step_by_step_solution: Distance first bus travels in 1 hour = 60 km; Relative speed = 80 - 60 = 20 km/h; Time to catch up = 60 / 20 = 3 hours.
